alert.note: Alert for Apple and Lucerne Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Excessive Heat Watch issued July 08 at 4:16AM PDT until July 16 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Dangerously hot conditions with temperatures up to 108 possible. * WHERE...Apple and Lucerne Valleys. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Extreme heat will significantly increase the potential for heat related illnesses, particularly for those working or participating in outdoor activities.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Be prepared to drink plenty of fluids, stay out of the midday sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. This is especially true during warm or hot weather when car interiors can reach lethal temperatures in a matter of minutes.
